faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Portreya

1.q: Will it look like me or like a generic AI face?
1.a: It will look like you. Our AI preserves your facial features, bone structure, and expression. What changes is the lighting, background, and attire — the things a professional photographer would control in a studio.

2.q: What if my only photo is a bad selfie?
2.a: That's fine. Our AI works with casual selfies, phone photos, even webcam screenshots. As long as your face is clearly visible and not obscured by sunglasses or hats, you'll get great results.

3.a: We offer a money-back guarantee on all paid plans. If the quality doesn't meet your expectations, contact us and we'll refund your purchase.

4.q: Can I use these headshots commercially?
4.a: Yes. All generated headshots are yours to use anywhere: LinkedIn, resumes, company websites, social media, or any other personal or professional purpose.

5.a: Generated headshots are high-resolution (1024x1024) and suitable for digital use on LinkedIn, websites, and social profiles.
